comment: Theres a lot of homework but you have all semester to do it. Frank really cares about his students and will try his hardest to help everyone get the grade they want.

Mr. Inscoe's Spanish 1101 class was awesome. There is a lot of online homework, but don't be intimidated by it. As long as you stay on top of it, it's totally manageable. He only gives a midterm and a final as tests but if you pay attention in class and do the homework you know what to expect. I would definitely take him again!

He was such a good and caring teacher! You had to put in a little bit of work and effort, but if you did, he was more than willing to help you the rest of the way. I really wish he taught higher level classes so I could take him again! I would actually be let down if class was canceled!!

I've never been good in Spanish, but he was a great teacher and taught the material in a way that I was actually able to understand it. He gave good examples when teaching something that he knew would be a little harder for us to understand. The lectures are always interesting and I was surprised that I enjoyed the class. Didn't use textbook ever!!

He allowed our class 2 absences before penalizing you, and he did give options for extra credit. Manages to be in a good mood at 8 am, which makes the class interesting. The test are easy as long as you've done the assignments and go over the study guide he sends you. Good at answering emails, and seems to always be open for questions after class.

Profesor Inscoe was an awesome teacher. It is only his first year at Kennesaw so he is new. He is younger,easy going, and makes class interesting. He aint bad to look at either. lol He did cancel a few classes but sent e-mails out informing the class about the upcoming cancellation. Study the study guides and you'll do great!

He canceled class a couple of times which was great because it's a morning class. He'll email you in advance so you don't show up. Make sure you're doing the assignments and you should pass. He teaches well, he's funny, and really passionate about Spanish
He's extremely helpful and is very knowledgeable. He's a cool guy and is funny. Attendance is mandatory but going to class helps keep your grade up. I definitely recommend taking his class.
